response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price tailored to our mutual benefit. After careful consideration, I propose that we transact this deal at $950,000. This price not only ensures a fair return on my investment but also leaves room for you to enjoy significant savings compared to its full value. I believe this offer presents a compelling proposition for both parties involved. Let's discuss further how we can make this transaction beneficial for all concerned.", "product_price": 950000}
